permitHolder: LITTLE ANGELS DAY CARE CENTER INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service/camp fails to comply with an Order of the Board or Commissioner of Health and Mental Hygiene
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service/camp maintains the existence of a nuisance at the time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to submit a corrective action plan within five days when required corrective action plan not approved
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Education Director or equivalent was not present at the time of inspection to supervise children/staff in an infant/toddler program
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Appropriate child activity not provided by child care service unacceptable forms of discipline utilized by staff of child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service fails to provide adequate periods of outdoor play Children observed improperly dressed for current weather conditions during periods of outdoor play
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
Written behavior management policy not provided at time of inspection distributed to staff or made available to parents
